name: sweet-snacks-take-a-bite-of-jeff-fisher
title: Sweet Snacks: Take A Bite Of Jeff Fisher
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
No, we’re not endorsing cannibalism here at Nashvillest. This weekend, Purity Dairies’ new Jeff Fisher’s Football Frenzy ice cream hits shelves, and we think it’s pretty awesome. What flavor is Jeff Fisher? We’re glad you asked. Jeff Fisher is apparently vanilla (heh, heh) with a smooth caramel swirl and has peanut butter footballs mixed in. 

“The introduction of Jeff Fisher’s Football Frenzy is Purity’s way of thanking the Titans for bringing entertainment, excitement and great sportsmanship to Tennessee for ten years,” said Tim Tracy, ice cream sales manager at Purity Dairies. “The Purity Dairies family is proud to share a hometown with the Titans, and we are pleased to share Jeff Fisher’s Football Frenzy with ice cream lovers and Titans fans alike.”

Purity Dairies is matching the new flavor with a Titans contest as well. Ten lucky Titans lovers will win a pair of Titans tickets, VIP Tailgating Party passes, and hotel accommodations for the night. The contest deadline is October 8. If you win, maybe you can get Jeff Fisher to autograph your ice cream for you.
